biotools.summary: A genomic interval searching strategy that provides users with the ability to conduct large-scale comparisons of their results with thousands of reference data sets and genome annotations in seconds. It enables the identification of novel and unexpected relationships among local data sets as well as the vast amount of publicly available genomics data.

bioschemas.name: GIGGLE
